subject: p15259244
History: -year-old female with hypotension, evaluate for infectious process.
Findings: The lungs are well expanded. Moderate cardiomegaly has improved since. The mediastinal silhouette and hilar contours are normal. Sternal wires are intact. Mitral valve ring is noted. No definite pleural effusion is present.
Impression: Improved moderate cardiomegaly. No evidence of cardiac decompensation.
